metadata.purpose: Hybrid search evaluation (dense + sparse) with LLM-judged relevance

queries.query: Find the parse_internal_call function that processes arguments and flags when invoking built-in commands
Find functions in the nu_parser::lex module responsible for breaking source code into tokens
Find the flatten_expression_into function that converts hierarchical AST nodes into a flat list of spans
Find the lex_item function that reads characters and produces a single lexical token
Find the math_result_type function that determines what type results from arithmetic operations
Find the eval_instruction function in nu_engine that executes a single IR opcode during runtime
Find the compile_expression function that transforms parsed AST nodes into intermediate representation
Find the loop_iteration function in nu_cli::repl that handles one cycle of the read-eval-print loop
Find the Eval trait in nu_protocol that provides a common interface for expression evaluation
Find the BlockBuilder implementation that constructs sequences of IR instructions during compilation
Find the PipelineData implementation that represents data flowing between commands in a pipeline
Find the ByteStream struct and its implementation for handling raw binary data in the shell
Find the PartialOrd implementation for Value that determines how shell values are sorted
Find the Signature struct implementation that defines a command's expected arguments, flags, and types
Find the Stack implementation that manages variable bindings and environment during execution
Find the ParseError enum in nu_protocol that contains all possible parsing error variants
Find the ShellError type that represents runtime errors in nushell
Find error handling code in the nu_protocol::errors module
Find the NuCompleter implementation that provides tab completion suggestions to the user
Find the Find command implementation that searches through collections and highlights matches
Find the Ansi command that outputs terminal escape sequences for colors and formatting
Find the Cal command implementation that displays calendar output
Find the dir_entry_dict function used by the ls command to convert file metadata into records
Find the EngineInterface implementation that allows plugins to communicate with the shell core
Find the External command implementation that spawns and manages operating system processes
Find the Module implementation that organizes exported commands, constants, and submodules into namespaces
Find the NuDataFrame implementation that wraps polars dataframes for use in nushell
Find the LanguageServer implementation that provides LSP features like go-to-definition
Find the lookup_style function in nu_color_config that converts color names to terminal formatting
Find the convert_to_value function in the nuon module that parses NUON text into runtime values
